title: 新建标签页显示“载入内容错误”loading error when i add new tab
content: 当我点击加号新建一个空白网页标签页时，显示“载入内容失败”“需要点击刷新”，但点击刷新仍然载入失败。

title: A GREAT BIG THANK YOU
content:
I dont know how to respond to the great persons that responded to my Invalid url problem, I tried the hold down shift key option (IT WORKED) afer going from a hairy dude to almosy bald over the last few days all I can do is say thanks to all of you and Firefox. TOP JOB and have given a score out of 10 18

I can only hope you guys get this message as at my age 81 today's technology 2024 can be and is an assue

Cheers

title: Chrome taking over FireFox and Brave Browsers
content:
I just had to reinstall Firefox because It keeps trying to take over Firefox. I had to delete Cert9.db., I found in my Profile.

How would I solve this problem permanently without having to go back and troubleshoot over and over again?
creator: Mghuhti

title: Rounded corners in fullscreen on Win11
content:
I have rounded corners and can see a 1px gap around fullscreen youtube videos and movies on disney +.

I can't remember how long this has been happening, but it's really distracting having a light border on the outermost 1px of my display when I play anything in fullscreen.

I've attached a zoomed in corner to demonstrate the issue
creator: crazylegoguy

title: firefox search box address window
content: i recently download firefox for a new computer when i went to search controls i noted that there was no choice for the address bar before i used the bar that had a search engines engine listed in the address bar but no i dont see it did something change at firefox i would still like a choice on watch search bar to use Im paul jensen beadoz@yahoo.co.uk

title: icloud calendar times are 7 hours off
content: My icloud calendar shows times 7 hours off on my macbook air, but not on my iphone using firefox or on my macbook air using safari.
creator: clairesandler

title: Login to PGA Tour
content:
I am trying to log onto the PGATour.com website and after entering my proper credentials the [Sign In] button doesn't work in Firefox, although the [Sign Up] button works as does the Forget Password and "Show" password links work. Everything works fine in both Chrome and Vivaldi.

This just started within the past month or so. I'm exhausted with today's software because every update breaks something else. Sigh...

Firefox v122.0 Windows 10 Pro
creator: BPaul_H

title: Firefox 122 Linux Tumbleweed
content: Firefox 122 can't display at least one site I found today. www.dominos.ca. Only part of the page loads many elements are missing. I have disabled all extensions and the problem still exists. This page never gave me problems before this latest Firefox.
creator: frankzen
